    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_OPTIONS

        public static final Options DEFAULT_OPTIONS
        Default Options settings. This is used if no Options is provided. It has no settings, no blacklisted modifiers, and uses the default implementations of all interfaces

    • Method Detail

      • constructSettings

        public static int constructSettings(int... settings)
        Construct a bitmask-ed settings int from a series of ints These ints should be obtained from Settings, however can be used for any bitmasking
        Parameters:
        settings - An array of integers to bitmask
        Returns:
        A bitmask-ed integer representing the given settings
